name: Empty Cloak
description: The Empty Cloak is a shadowy construct, resembling a flowing garment with no visible contents, capable of moving fluidly on the battlefield.
memorable: It can burst into pieces when critically hit, showcasing its unique resilience and shadowy nature.
goals: To serve as a sentinel and protect its allies while engaging a variety of foes.
relations: Typically encountered with constructs or shadow-themed creatures.
environment: Can be found in dark, shadowy areas or as guardians in enigmatic locations.
strengths: Possesses advantage on Perception checks and can protect allies by absorbing damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, reflecting its shadowy, ethereal makeup.
attacks: Can perform the Razor Cloak for slashing damage, Shadow Slam for bludgeoning damage, and Shadow Snare to grapple enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Wrapping Embrace reduces incoming damage to allies while absorbing it for itself.
senses: Has heightened perception with advantage on Wisdom checks.
skills: Has proficiency in Stealth, benefiting its shadowy nature.
additional_information: Immunities to poison and psychic damage.
Can grapple targets with its shadowy tendrils.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Can occupy the same space as Medium or smaller creatures.
test_queries: cool defensive tactics of the Empty Cloak
creature that grapples with shadowy tendrils
unique construct with no visible contents
